numbered_ace_sentences: 1. 50% of males say that they reach out to their parents through text at least once a week.
2. Around 70% of females say that they reach out to their parents through text at least once a week.
3. 30% of males say that they reach out to their parents through phone calls at least once a week.
4. 55% of females say that they reach out to their parents through phone calls at least once a week.
5. About 20% of males say that they visit their parents at least once a week.
6. About 25% of females say that they visit their parents at least once a week.
7. The percentage-gap between males and females is smaller for in-person visiting than for texting.
8. I wonder why the percentage-gap decreases for in-person visiting.
9. I wonder why the percentage-gap increases for texting.
10. This comment relates to my community.
11. The elder community is important in my community.
13. The headline is: Moms are not getting their visits.
